delete.label: Delete
delete.error: Failed to delete selected datasets. Please try again.

confirm.title: Are you sure?
confirm.description: This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete selected dataset?

upload.title: Upload a dataset
upload.body: Upload a dataset to use in fine-tuning.

datasetName.label: Dataset name
datasetName.placeholder: Provide a name for the dataset
datasetName.nonUniqueNameError: Another dataset with the same name already exists
datasetName.invalidCharactersError: Dataset name can only contain letters, numbers, underscores, periods, and dashes

datasetType.label: Data type
datasetType.placeholder: Select the type of data you are uploading

description.label: Description
description.placeholder: Provide a description for the dataset

fileUpload.label: Upload file
fileUpload.placeholder: JSONL file containing data in the appropriate format, up to {{value}} in size. Please refer to our documentation to determine the format for each row.
fileUpload.filesizeError: File size must be less than {{value}}
fileUpload.formatError: Only JSONL files with data in the appropriate format are allowed
